name: Para Souls
description:
Entering full screen recommended!

MUSIC STARTS AFTER YOU RESTART THE GAME (not respawn)

Setting:

You are an explorer penetrating deeper in the pyramid of Khufu than anyone before, creeping through the dark catacombs and breathe the musty air. All of a sudden, the walls light up with hieroglyphics, and a voice starts speaking. "Beware!" it says, "I am the guardian spirit of Khufu's tomb, and you have entered the forbidden chambers. You must cross my gauntlet of chambers to be rewarded with your freedom, otherwise you will be trapped with me forever! Luckily, I have shown you mercy and given you the gift of renewable life, so that it is your cunning and your bravery that decides whether you triumph this challenge. Good luck, you're going to need it...

Controls:Movement: WASD

Dash: Right Click in direction

Shoot: Left Click in direction

When in range, click E to open chests

Walk into items like "the holy question mark"  or "the sticky bandage" to pick them up

To change bullet types, press E when in range of a morphing bullet

Items you can get in a chest:

The sticky bandage

The morphing bullet 

The holy question mark???

Game info:

You get 3 chances to respawn. Each time you do, the map changes to a new randomly generated one. You can find things in chests to increase certain stats and/or change your inventory. 

Rare secrets include:

The holy question mark???

The unexpected stop...


Good Luck Explorer!

Our amazing team:

Programming 😎 - Journolud & KJDaPooh

Art 🖊️- ImaCupaJoe & CloudyTempest
